assertion.label: Change Details
assertion.name: change_details
assertion.value: The article <Emphasis Type="Bold">“Perspectives of adults with Klinefelter syndrome, unaffected adolescent males, and parents of affected children toward diagnosis disclosure: a Thai experience”</Emphasis>, written by Sukrit Suwannachat, Duangrurdee Wattanasirichaigoon, Jiraporn Arunakul, Vilawan Chirdkiatgumchai and Thipwimol Tim-Aroon, was originally published electronically on the publisher’s internet portal (currently SpringerLink) on September 2019 without open access.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the institutional and/or national and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000 (5) and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
